name: BroadRadio
0:
”Alexa, open broad live”
”Alexa, start broad live”
”Alexa, ask broad live what's playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: broad live
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Join us for real-talk about fully-lived lives. We centre and elevate women’s voices to support their happiness, health and pursuit of fearlessness.

We believe in the power of connecting women with women. We thrive when we lift each other up. We value kindness. We bloody love a laugh. And we have no time for ladylike.
We know you are smart and insightful. Curious and complex. Fabulous and fun. And we know you have more to say, more to share and more to give. That’s why we’re here for more.

Listen to live radio on the Broad Radio network, featuring dynamic talk radio show Morning Broads five days a week, and Friday drive brings you Fierce to fire up your afternoon. We top it off with Yapas Yarnin’ on a Friday afternoon. Plus, impeccable music at all hours.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
